content: अजिर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [अज् गतौ किरन् वीभावाभावः <ls>Uṇ. 1. 53.</ls>] Quick, swift (शीघ्र) --रः {@--1@} A sort of mouse, hairy mole. {@--2@} A kind of ceremony in pronouncing curses. --रं {@--1@} A court-yard, an enclosed space, arena; उटजाजिरप्रकीर्ण <ls>K. 39</ls>, <ls>Ki. 1. 16</ls>; so रण°, गृह° &c. {@--2@} The body. {@--3@} Any object of sense. {@--4@} The wind, air. {@--5@} A frog. --रा {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a river. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Durgā. --रः <ab>N.</ab> of a snake priest.
